EmailTemplate.name: 202104_Americas-EMEAI_ATR_Pilots_Webinar_Teams.1.Pilots Webinar Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: Pilots Conference April 27
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> Join your Honeywell In-Service Engineers for a regional webinar covering the latest technical updates on product performance improvements.
This webinar will provide customers an overview of available pilot support and resource material, a status on CPDLC implementation, and avionics product updates. REGISTER NOW <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/events/2021/04/emeai-pilots-webinar]]>
